title: The Chronicles of Oscar Thompson: Planner Extraordinaire
summary: Oscar Thompson discovers his ability to manipulate time through his planning skills, resolving crises and saving lives over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Oscar Thompson entdeckt seine Fähigkeit, durch seine Planungsfähigkeiten die Zeit zu manipulieren, löst Krisen und rettet im Laufe einer Woche Leben.
summaryDutch: Oscar Thompson ontdekt zijn vermogen om tijd te manipuleren door zijn planningsvaardigheden, lost crises op en redt levens gedurende een week.
summaryFrench: Oscar Thompson découvre sa capacité à manipuler le temps grâce à ses compétences en planification, résolvant des crises et sauvant des vies au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: As he organized his weekly agenda, Oscar felt a strange surge of energy. Unknown to him, his meticulous planning was setting the stage for discovering his unique powers.
While scheduling the local community event, Oscar accidentally stumbled on a time anomaly. This revelation piqued his curiosity and excitement.
Using his newfound ability, Oscar cautiously experimented, managing to undo a small but potentially hazardous incident at the event, feeling utterly triumphant.
Challenges arose as Oscar tried to refine his time-altering skills, leading to several near misses that left him feeling both exhilarated and slightly sad.
Embracing his role as a protector, Oscar planned a sequence of actions that prevented a major crisis, feeling the weight of his responsibilities but also the joy of success.
A romantic interest in the community noticed Oscar's secretive acts of heroism. Their support and admiration sparked a new, tender connection.
Reflecting on his extraordinary week, Oscar felt peaceful, knowing he had made his world a better place, and pondered the future possibilities of his powers.

ending: With every plan, Oscar shaped not only time but futures, discovering that true heroism lies in the intent behind each action.
moral: Great power not only comes with great responsibility but also requires thoughtful planning and consideration.
